It is currently uncharged.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Holy sanguinesti staffUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Holy sanguinesti staff (uncharged).pngWeight: 1.500Value: 5000000Version anchor: UnchargedRelease date: 3 June 2021Item ID: 25733

The Holy Sanguinesti staff is a sanguinesti staff with a holy ornament kit attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add Saradominist aesthetics to the staff, replacing the bat on the staff with an owl.

The holy Sanguinesti staff retains all the properties that the original variant has, such as its passive effect and its built-in spell, which still requires blood runes to charge.

While the staff is untradeable in its ornamented and charged state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the ornament kit and staff.

The '''Holy Sanguinesti staff''' is a [[sanguinesti staff]] with a [[holy ornament kit]] attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add [[Saradomin]]ist aesthetics to the staff, replacing the bat on the staff with an owl.

The holy Sanguinesti staff retains all the properties that the original variant has, such as its passive effect and its built-in spell, which still requires [[blood rune]]s to charge.

While the staff is untradeable in its ornamented and charged state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the ornament kit and staff.
